content.query:
---VBAK, -> VBAP -> VBEP
select 
vbap.VBELN	
,vbap.POSNR	
,vbap.MATNR	
,vbap.PSTYV	
,vbap.UMZIZ	
,vbap.UMZIN	
,vbap.KWMENG	
,vbap.VRKME	
,vbap.WERKS	
,vbap.J_3ASEAN	
,vbak.VBELN	
,vbak.ERDAT	
,vbak.ERNAM	
,vbak.AUDAT	
,vbak.VBTYP	
,vbak.AUART	
,vbak.FAKSK	
,vbak.VKORG	
,vbak.VTWEG	
,vbak.SPART	
,vbak.VKGRP	
,vbak.VKBUR	
,vbak.KNUMV	
,vbak.VDATU	
,vbak.BSARK	
,vbak.KUNNR	
,vbak.AEDAT	
,vbak.KVGR3	
,vbak.BUKRS_VF
,vbep.VBELN	
,vbep.POSNR	
,vbep.ETENR	
,vbep.WMENG	
,vbep.J_3ASIZE	
,vbep.J_3ASZGR	
,sum(vbep.J_3ANETW) as J_3ANETW
,sum(vbap.NETWR) as NETWR	
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),konv_k.KWERT)) as KWERT_k
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),konv_b.KWERT)) as KWERT_b
--,vbap.NETWR
from cleansing_data.sap_vbap as vbap   
left join cleansing_data.sap_vbak as vbak on vbap.VBELN = vbak.VBELN
--left join cleansing_data.sap_tvagt  as tvagt on tvagt. = vbap.VRKME
--cleansing_data.sap_t006a
left join cleansing_data.sap_vbep as vbep on 
		vbep.VBELN  = vbap.VBELN  and 
		vbep.POSNR  = vbap.POSNR 


left join cleansing_data.sap_konv  as konv_k  on  konv_k.KNUMV = vbak.KNUMV 
left join cleansing_data.sap_konv  as konv_b  on  konv_b.KPOSN = vbep.POSNR and konv_b.KSTAT <> 'X' 
and konv_b.KSCHL in('ZCMI','ICMI','ZNFC')
where vbap.VBELN = '0001413005' --and vbap.MATNR	= '000000001000059056'
group by 
vbap.VBELN	
,vbap.POSNR	
,vbap.MATNR	
,vbap.PSTYV	
,vbap.UMZIZ	
,vbap.UMZIN	
,vbap.KWMENG	
,vbap.VRKME	
,vbap.WERKS	
,vbap.J_3ASEAN	
,vbak.VBELN	
,vbak.ERDAT	
,vbak.ERNAM	
,vbak.AUDAT	
,vbak.VBTYP	
,vbak.AUART	
,vbak.FAKSK	
,vbak.VKORG	
,vbak.VTWEG	
,vbak.SPART	
,vbak.VKGRP	
,vbak.VKBUR	
,vbak.KNUMV	
,vbak.VDATU	
,vbak.BSARK	
,vbak.KUNNR	
,vbak.AEDAT	
,vbak.KVGR3	
,vbak.BUKRS_VF
,vbep.VBELN	
,vbep.POSNR	
,vbep.ETENR	
,vbep.WMENG	
,vbep.J_3ASIZE	
,vbep.J_3ASZGR
